metadata.title: CVE-2022-1105 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper access control vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting allversions from 13.11 prior to 14.7.7, 14.8 prior to 14.8.5, and 14.9 priorto 14.9.2 allows an unauthorized user to access pipeline analytics evenwhen public pipelines are disabled

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
